channel.title: How to make a 317 Runescape Private Server [Delta]
channel.description:
[b]Purpose:[/b] I'm really bored and honestly don't know what to do. I know Delta is gross but its basic and simple and ok to start on. Please don't flame i'm simply just making this for the beginners that want to code. And need to post my tutorial somewhere actually legitimate. Thanks and please give feedback. [b]Difficulty:[/b]1 (This is [u]very very very[/u] basic) [b]Credits?(never done a tutorial before)[/b]: Apocalypse Pk for the client and his source, me for modifying it slightly for this tut
[center][size=18pt][u][b] How to make a 317 server and a client:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[u][b] Getting the server running:[/b][/u]
First your going to want [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html]JDK and JRE[/url] Now your gonna need [url=http://www.rarsoft.com/download.htm]WinRar[/url]
once you have finished downloading and installing those, you'll need a server source.
Xell Scape Server: [b]http://www.mediafire.com/?yttdddzmdyn[/b]
Information on server here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=435696.0
Now extract your server to your desktop.
Next, open up the folder.
click on [b]Compile.bat[/b] let the server compile, once done, exit out. If you get any errors, post in reply or PM me.
Now you need to get your no-ip host. Go to: http://www.no-ip.com
Create an account.
Login and select "Add a host"
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/host.png[/img]
Now pick a name for your server. In this guide, well make it "Cool Scape"
so fill out whatever your sever name is in the box. For example:
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/coolscapetut.png[/img]
Now that that is created, download the [url=https://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php]No-Ip Duc[/url]
Open up the DUC and login.
Check off your host you created, and minimize the window down.
WERE ALMOST DONE WITH THE SERVER SIDE!
Now open up your files. Open [b]Client.java[/b]
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/cleintjaba.png[/img]
hit [b]ctrl + H[/b]
and replace xell scape with your name, but in this example, ill use "cool scape"
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/replace1.png[/img]
hit save and exit out.
Now click [b]Compile.bat[/b]
Now click [b] Runserver.bat[/b] And leave the window minimized! your servers now running.
Now your halfway Done!
[hr]
[u][b]Getting your client set up:[/b][/u]
First, download my edited client here (background is a lightning bolt, nothing much):
Client download: [b]http://www.mediafire.com/?wby2wtn2uhk7hu1[/b]
Now extract it to your desktop. Rename the folder after your server. Go into the files. Open up [b]GUI.java[/b] and hit [b]ctrl + f[/b]
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/ipadressds.png[/img]
hit save and exit.
go into client.java and hit [b]ctrl + H[/b]
Do the same thing in the server's client .java; replace Xell scape with "YOURSERVERNAME" hit file > Save.
now hit [b]Compile.bat[/b]
hit play now, and your up and running! [hr]
How to add objects and Npcs COMING SOON!

item.title: How to make a 317 Runescape Private Server [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

There isn’t much of a difference between this Tutorial and the other Tutorial. You have just provided a download link for a DeltaScape base.

oh my gawd im such a dumbass, i didnt realize there was a sticky, FMl.

[hr]

it will be different however, because im going to expand on the topic and tech common stuff, such as how to spawn things, edit spawn zone, making commands, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a 317 Runescape Private Server [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

Purpose: I’m really bored and honestly don’t know what to do. I know Delta is gross but its basic and simple and ok to start on. Please don’t flame i’m simply just making this for the beginners that want to code. And need to post my tutorial somewhere actually legitimate. Thanks and please give feedback.
Difficulty:1 (This is very very very basic)
Credits?(never done a tutorial before): Apocalypse Pk for the client and his source, me for modifying it slightly for this tut

[center][size=18pt]
How to make a 317 server and a client:[/size][/center]


Getting the server running:

First your going to want JDK and JRE
Now your gonna need WinRar

once you have finished downloading and installing those, you’ll need a server source.

Xell Scape Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?yttdddzmdyn

Information on server here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=435696.0

Now extract your server to your desktop.

Next, open up the folder.

click on Compile.bat let the server compile, once done, exit out. If you get any errors, post in reply or PM me.

Now you need to get your no-ip host. Go to: http://www.no-ip.com

Create an account.

Login and select “Add a host”

host.png699×137

Now pick a name for your server. In this guide, well make it “Cool Scape”

so fill out whatever your sever name is in the box. For example:

coolscapetut.png720×562

Now that that is created, download the No-Ip Duc

Open up the DUC and login.

Check off your host you created, and minimize the window down.

WERE ALMOST DONE WITH THE SERVER SIDE!

Now open up your files.
Open Client.java

hit ctrl + H

and replace xell scape with your name, but in this example, ill use “cool scape”

hit save and exit out.

Now click Compile.bat

Now click Runserver.bat And leave the window minimized! your servers now running.

Now your halfway Done!

[hr]

Getting your client set up:

First, download my edited client here (background is a lightning bolt, nothing much):

Client download: http://www.mediafire.com/?wby2wtn2uhk7hu1

Now extract it to your desktop.
Rename the folder after your server.
Go into the files.
Open up GUI.java
and hit ctrl + f

hit save and exit.

go into client.java and hit ctrl + H

Do the same thing in the server’s client .java; replace Xell scape with “YOURSERVERNAME”
hit file > Save.

now hit Compile.bat

hit play now, and your up and running!
[hr]

How to add objects and Npcs COMING SOON!
